snippet.title: echoshift™ - PSP® Official Trailer
snippet.description:
echoshift™ redefines puzzle games with an innovative game play mechanic that challenges you to manipulate time and be in multiple places at once! Plan ahead to solve puzzles by layering your actions on top of each other to push switches, bridge gaps, and much more. 

Available exclusively for the PSP® system.

echoshift is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc.  Developed by Artoon. (c) 2009 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.
